aiExecutiveSummary.overview: Your privacy profile shows elevated risk with consistent high-risk behavior patterns. You've shared sensitive information including email addresses and phone numbers across 145 comments, resulting in an 8.2 average risk score that requires immediate attention.
keyFindings: Email addresses exposed in 67% of your comments

Risk score increased 45% since account creation
Peak sharing occurs during evening hours (6-9 PM)
Support-related comments show highest PII exposure
priorities: Review and edit comments containing email addresses
